name: MentalMath
0:
”Alexa start Mental Math”
”Quiz me”
”What is my score”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mental math
des:
How good are you at doing math in your head? Using this skill you can get better at doing simple math problems in your head. 

Begin by starting a quiz, then start answering the questions. Check your score at any time to see how well you are doing. 

This is a great skill to get your kids to practice their math skills.

Once you start the skill by saying something like: "Alexa open Mental Math", then you no longer have to say "Alexa ask Mental Math..." before each phrase, instead you can just say things like "Quiz me" or "What's my score" or "Repeat the question".

Note: This current version only supports addition. In a future update, there will be addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division problems added. In addition, you will be able to set the difficulty of the problems to range from easy to challenging problems involving decimals.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
